sections.heading: of security interest; seller; duty
sections.text: In order to verify the existence or nonexistence of a security interest, a buyer, commission merchant, or selling agent may request a seller to disclose such seller's approved unique identifier.SourceLaws 1986, Third Spec. Sess., LB 1, § 17;Laws 2007, LB124, § 67;L

52-1317.Verification of security interest; seller; duty.

In order to verify the existence or nonexistence of a security interest, a buyer, commission merchant, or selling agent may request a seller to disclose such seller's approved unique identifier.

SourceLaws 1986, Third Spec. Sess., LB 1, § 17;Laws 2007, LB124, § 67;Laws 2015, LB464, § 3.
